### Changelog

* 1.0.4 - 2018-06-04
	- Fixed issues when placing order with discounts.
* 1.0.3 - 2018-04-10
	- Fixed issue with invalid amount calculations for PayPal.
* 1.0.2 - 2018-03-21
	- Added support for Jigoshop processing fee.
* 1.0.1 - 2017-10-24
	- Fixed bug with order total not being properly rounded.
* 1.0 	- 2017-09-25
    - Realise redeveloped
